title: Dolly Parton’s Own Wig Line Is In The Works & You Bet Your Ass I’m Getting All Of Them
text:
Howdy, sisters. I don’t mean to startle you, but I have important news – Ms Dolly Parton is going to be releasing an entire line of her iconic signature wigs. You know the ones – those glorious lace-fronts that’ll add an extra 6 feet to your height and have you standing that much closer to Jesus.

Gussying up has never been more exciting.

In her recent interview with ELLE, The Leading Lady of Country discussed a fashion line deal she’d recently penned with IMG, which will include a whole assortment of Dolly-esque gifts, from makeup and clothes to those sweet, sweet wigs.

“I’m going to do it. I’m going to get there,” she told the publication. “It’s one of my dreams – the makeup, hair, and wigs, clothes, all of that sort of thing.” We stan an aspiring entrepreneur/mogul.

READ MORE Cody Simpson Is Pumping Out Insta Poetry About Miley Like A Horny Rupi Kaur

She elaborated on her love for wigs: “I don’t always wear them in my daily life, but I always still pouf up my hair. I still like to have that flashy hair. When I’m around home, I wear my little scrunchies, but I always put on some makeup and fix my own hair as cute as I can fix it.”

“Wigs are just so handy. I’m so busy, and I have so many choices. I never have a bad hair day, and that’s a good thing.”

Dolly could sell me a fart in a bottle for all I care, so the thought of owning my own Dolly wig is too much to handle at this moment in time.

I’m saving all of my precious pennies because I want to buy 7 – one for every goddamn day of the week. Yeehaw.

Source: ELLE
description: Dolly Parton signed a deal with IMG a few months ago and is going to be releasing an entire line of her iconic signature wigs.
